column2:
Show Colonial Annexation Decisions 

§RWe can only annex a given new world colony once!

The greatest plantations in the world exist not in Egypt, but in the land between Tehas and the Atlantic. Some have petitioned for them to have their own freedom of trade and governance
The land the natives call 'Tehas' is dry and hard to farm in. Several business men have come to our government to charter a corperation there.

Termed "Brazilwood", the trees that grow in this region of the world have led to a very successful colony. Planters have lobbied the government for a free government and reduced tariffs
